title: Restrictions on Use of Shared and Group Accounts

parameters.label: organization-defined conditions for establishing shared and group accounts

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Only permit the use of shared and group accounts that meet {{ ac-2.9_prm_1 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Before permitting the use of shared or group accounts, organizations consider the increased risk due to the lack of accountability with such accounts.
